message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today for $20,000. I believe it will be very valuable for you.
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer, but $20,000 is too high for me. I'm willing to pay $8,000 for the product.
Thanks for the offer, Bob.  I understand your perspective, but I can't go quite that low.  Would you consider $17,000?
I appreciate you coming down, Alice.  However, $17,000 is still more than I'm comfortable with. Could we meet in the middle at $12,000?
